channel.title: VitalizePK
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QJ2RM.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B]Introduction[/B]
VitalizePK is mainly a PKing server, although nearly all skills are working perfectly and all play their own part in the pking world. As this is mainly a pking server, there will be no need to train your combat skills, simply login and set your levels! Although, the server is a 317 loading 377 cache, there are custom items packed in, however we are not one of those servers that loads all the new animations and quite frankly, ugly hit splats. We still remain a mainly oldschool server with an oldschool feel, and the custom items that are in the game, are also hard to obtain.
VitalizePK is an oldschool based server. Any later RS content such as newer items such as the Dragon Defender is a challenge to obtain. We aim to keep a balance as such most people will be easily able to obtain basic oldschool pking items, barrows, non-spawnables (Fire Cape, Fighter Torso, Rune defender) with ease and get pking, but the option is there for anyone whom puts the effort in to gain an advantage with more powerful items such as PVP armour. Those whom really show there dedication can access the ability to obtain the Tokhaar-Kal.
Weapons like the Vesta's Longsword, Statius Warhammer and Dragon Claws are all fully functional within the server, we also have Dungeoneering items - 'Chaotics' and Arcane Streams! Our client supports both 'new' and 'old' hits (X10) which can be toggled with the simple commands:- :: newhits or :: oldhits, depending on your style of play. If you enjoy hybridding, you'll enjoy VitalizePK. Item switching has been re-done and the combat system has been enhanced to account for the modern-day pker's needs.
[b]Developer:[/b]
[ul][li]Liberty. (Main Developer)[/li][/ul]
[b]Server Content:[/b]
[ul][li]Flawless switching.[/li] [li]Great combat, been re-done.[/li] [li]Instant login and PK.[/li] [li]Various PK teleports.[/li] [li]Duel arena.[/li] [li]Hybrid Tournaments (Custom place).[/li] [li]Clipped following (in and out of wilderness).[/li][/ul]
[b]Client Content:[/b]
[ul][li]377 cache loading some 600+ items.[/li] [li]Uses update server.[/li] [li]Toggle options e.g x10 hits.[/li] [li]Low data usage.[/li] [li]Small cache.[/li] [li]Clean and tidy.[/li][/ul]
[center]________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]
[CENTER][B]Media:[/B]
Switches.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sk11n.gif[/img]
Replaced make over mage interface with this one.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Fikt9.png[/img]
Non-tradeable's stay on the ground for player 1 to pick them up.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Tuif2.png[/img]
Loyality titles.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kZW39.png[/img]
Some dialogue: Removed the altars and added Brother Jered.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QmsM4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/r0ZiA.png[/img]
Donator store, located at home but non-donators can't trade with it. They will receive this message:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qIuX1.png[/img]
More coming...[/CENTER]
[center]________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]
[b]Update Log:[/b]
[ul][li]28th of July 2012 - Development started.[/li] [li]28th of July 2012 - Base completely stripped, source cleaned.[/li][/ul]
-
[ul][li]29th of July 2012 - Removed altars and added Brother Jered.[/li] [li]29th of July 2012 - PK system added, meaning point rewards for killing players, shop, item prices etc.[/li] [li]29th of July 2012 - Prayer altar recharges special attack every 360 seconds.[/li] [li]29th of July 2012 - Removed make over mage interface on starter and added a custom interface.[/li] [li]29th of July 2012 - Loyality Ranks added.[/li] [li]29th of July 2012 - Fixed several nasty dupes, thanks to the snippet & tutorial section.[/li] [li]29th of July 2012 - Cleaned quest tab and added relevant information e.g. Amount of PK Points etc.[/li][/ul]
-
[ul][li]30th of July 2012 - Fiddled around with quest tab, added more information and made it update as it didn't before.[/li] [li]30th of July 2012 - Dad boss added near East Dragon's, boss is in level 29-30 wilderness. Drops spirit shields.[/li][/ul]
-
[ul][li]31st of July 2012 - Ghost Disciple added, speak to him and he spawns you a set of armour.[/li] [li]31st of July 2012 - Dismantling godsword(s) added, checked and it's dupe free.[/li] [li]31st of July 2012 - Added more rewards to the PKP store and set their prices.[/li][/ul]

item.title: VitalizePK
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

Soulcist:

I saw this on Rune-Server and this looks like an actual interesting PvP server, good luck with the development.

It will be interesting.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

Introduction

VitalizePK is mainly a PKing server, although nearly all skills are working perfectly and all play their own part in the pking world. As this is mainly a pking server, there will be no need to train your combat skills, simply login and set your levels! Although, the server is a 317 loading 377 cache, there are custom items packed in, however we are not one of those servers that loads all the new animations and quite frankly, ugly hit splats. We still remain a mainly oldschool server with an oldschool feel, and the custom items that are in the game, are also hard to obtain.

VitalizePK is an oldschool based server. Any later RS content such as newer items such as the Dragon Defender is a challenge to obtain. We aim to keep a balance as such most people will be easily able to obtain basic oldschool pking items, barrows, non-spawnables (Fire Cape, Fighter Torso, Rune defender) with ease and get pking, but the option is there for anyone whom puts the effort in to gain an advantage with more powerful items such as PVP armour. Weapons like the Vesta’s Longsword, Statius Warhammer and Dragon Claws are all fully functional within the server, we also have Dungeoneering items - ‘Chaotics’ and Arcane Streams! Our client supports both ‘new’ and ‘old’ hits (X10) which can be toggled with the simple commands:- :: newhits or :: oldhits, depending on your style of play. If you enjoy hybridding, you’ll enjoy VitalizePK. Item switching has been re-done and the combat system has been enhanced to account for the modern-day pker’s needs.

Developer:

[ul][li]Liberty. (Main Developer)[/li][/ul]

[ul][li]Flawless switching.[/li]

Non-tradeable’s stay on the ground for player 1 to pick them up.

Loyality titles.

Some dialogue: Removed the altars and added Brother Jered.
